title: @Meddler.... I main AP Lucian...Please read this...
body:
I know I'm going to get down voted but I'm really hoping someone from riot sees this.

I'm a ap Lucian main and more than confident AP Lucian is a totally viable build with its pros and cons compared to AD Lucian. Most ppl think it is trash until they see me in action.

 I don't play ranked as I'm interested in playing for fun and not stressing myself out.

Now, what I would like to point out to riot is, the nerfs to Lucian on the PBE, will destroy AP Lucian. 

His ult is taking a big hit in its base damage in the early ranks but remains relatively the same at rank 3. A big part of AP Lucian is his ult and I feel like his AP Lucian is getting a huge nerf base on AD Lucian armor pen building ways.

Another thing is his W lost some range too to make it match the range on his ult. 


All, I'm asking is that you take into consideration his AP kit and provide some compensation for this. Champ build diversity is very important and a fun part of the game for me at least. As long as it is not OP like tank Ekko/Fizz.

Thanks.

replies.body:
> I know I'm going to get down voted

People really need to stop putting lines like this in their threads.  It does nothing and is just a waste of space.  Just make your thread and let the votes happen.
I downvote everything I see with this. Just makes you sound like you're fishing for upvotes lol.
If they gave Lucian an AP ratio on his Q, that'd be good.
I looked at your match history, had no idea AP lucian could kill so many people
He's not purposed to be an AP mid laner, so I don't think they have any problem killing off something that likely was never intended.
I think the problem with this is that AD Lucian is completely bonkers, and if riot wants to give him good nerfs, they might have to hit Ap lucian as well, unfortunately.
